sentences.sContent: But just like Dutch in Predator before the final battle, you have to be able to answer only one question about your target before you start: where they are.
sentences.sContent_eng: But just like Dutch in Predator before the final battle, you have to be able to answer only one question about your target before you start: where they are.
sentences.sCn: 但就像一战之前的荷兰掠夺者一样，在开始工作之前你必须能够回答实现目标的唯一问题：他们在哪里？

sentences.sContent: Nor would they buy the overpriced textiles that the Dutch brought in from India.
sentences.sContent_eng: Nor would they buy the overpriced textiles that the Dutch brought in from India.
sentences.sCn: 他们也不会买荷兰人从印度带来的价格过高的纺织品。

phrases.pCn: 荷兰式拍卖；喊价逐步减低的拍卖
各付己帐；各自付帐的聚餐或娱乐活动
无法理解的语言；莫名其妙的话

trans.tranOther: relating to the Netherlands, its people, or its language
